Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package docker-compose for versions less than 2.27.0-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-compose is earlier than 2.27.0-2, affected by CVE-2024-45337
